entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
